mdRecord.dcterms:title: The mirrour of justices: written originally in the Old French, long before the conquest; and many things added / by Andrew Horne; to which is added The diversity of courts and their jurisdiction. Tr. into English by W.H. of Gray's Inn, esq
The diversity of courts and their jurisdiction
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Horne, Andrew, -1328
Hughes, William, 1587 or 1588-1663?
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed by His Majesty's law printers for J. Worrall and B. Tovey [etc.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "The diversity of courts" (p.[285]-325) has special t-p.: The diversity of courts and their jurisdiction. Compiled ann. 21 Henry VIII. in French, tr. into English ann. 1646. By W. H. [i.e. William Hughes, of Gray's Inn, esq.] the 2d ed., cor. and paged as the former. [London] J. Worrall and B. Tovey [etc.] 1768.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Law--Great Britain.
